text: Moldovan Canadians are Canadians of full or partial Moldovan. According to the 2011 Census, there were 8,050 Canadians who claimed Moldovan ancestry. In 2010, the first Moldovan Orthodox church, with services in the Romanian language, has been established for the Moldovan community in Montreal, Quebec, which has over 3,500 Moldovan families.& www.info-prim.md & www.ortodoxia.md/stiri/3073 Mitropolia.md ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in Canada
title: Moldovan Canadians
